jobDescription: We are looking for a Data analyst with 6 to 10 years of experience in data sourcing and data analysis skills and should be proficient in SQL. The candidate should have experience working in the Banking or Financial Services Sector and experience in Regulatory, MIS or Risk Reporting is a plus.
